name: MORNING POST
description:
MORNING POST!

HELLO :D

LEFT CLICK - throw post

RIGHT CLICK - open doors and cupboards

LEFT CONTROL- crouch

MOUSE - look around

W,A,S,D - move

ESC - quit at any time

CREATED BY

Happy Snake @happysnakegames

https://happysnakeblog.wordpress.com/
